TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContextEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class TraceContextEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class TraceContextEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 向所有处理 事件的方法提供跟踪记录的集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of trace records to any method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由类以提供访问跟踪记录所有跟踪信息收集在 HTTP 请求处理过程。The class is used by the class to provide access to trace records after all the tracing information is gathered during HTTP request processing. 通过添加事件处理程序委托来处理事件，可以处理的记录，它们记录到你自己的数据存储，或将它们作为分析工具的输入提供。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the event, you can process the records, record them to your own data store, or provide them as input to a profiling tool. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册委托来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此示例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法访问的集合对象通过属性，循环访问它们，并将其写入到响应流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: records
param.span: 对象的集合，表示当前请求的所有跟踪记录。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent all the trace records logged for the current request.

summary.span: 使用提供的跟踪记录集合来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the provided collection of trace records.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TraceRecords As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ TraceRecords { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取与当前请求关联的 消息的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of messages that are associated with the current request.

value.span: 与当前请求关联的跟踪记录的集合。

span.span: A collection of trace records that are associated with the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用并方法将生成添加到对象消息集合。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 方法调用设置属性设置为`true`，而其他方法调用将其设置为`false`。The method call sets the property to `true`, while the other method calls set it to `false`. 可循环访问消息并检查记录与特定类别或消息，并指明它们是否警告。You can iterate through the messages and examine records with specific categories or messages, and whether they are warnings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册委托来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此示例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法访问的集合对象通过属性，循环访问它们，并将其写入到响应流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]
